story:
Once upon a time, in a quaint little village in Italy, there lived a young boy named Matteo. Matteo’s father was a talented baker, and he would wake up early each morning to help his father make the most delicious bread in all the land.

One day, Matteo’s father told him a special secret. He said, "If you listen carefully, you can hear the whispering of the trees in the nearby forest. The trees have stories to tell, and if you are kind and patient, they might share their wisdom with you."

Curious and eager to uncover the mysteries of the forest, Matteo quietly made his way through the trees one evening, listening closely to the rustling leaves and singing birds. As he ventured deeper into the forest, he stumbled upon a clearing filled with glowing fireflies dancing in the moonlight.

Suddenly, an ancient oak tree spoke to Matteo in a gentle voice. "Welcome, young one," the tree said. "I have been watching over this forest for centuries, and I have seen many wonders. But you, Matteo, have a kind heart and a pure spirit. I will share with you the magic of the forest."

Throughout the night, the wise old oak tree shared stories of bravery, kindness, and the importance of cherishing nature. Matteo listened intently, feeling a deep connection to the forest and all its inhabitants. As the sun began to rise, the tree whispered one last piece of advice: "Remember, Matteo, that true magic lies within your heart. Always be kind and follow your dreams."

Matteo returned home with a heart full of wonder and a new understanding of the world around him. From that day on, he carried the wisdom of the forest with him, spreading kindness and joy wherever he went.

And so, dear child, remember the tale of Matteo and the enchanted forest, for it reminds us all to listen to the whispers of nature and to always follow our hearts.

Goodnight, sweet child. May your dreams be filled with magic and wonder. Buonanotte.
